Job Description

The Experimentation Team

We enable Traveloka to experiment and innovate. As the Experimentation team, we are at the core of product development and revenue optimization. We build and run the platforms to run experimentation and optimization. We collaborate with business owners and fellow data analysts to ensure rigorous decision-making.

Job Description 

Our data science team is responsible for solving complex problems and optimizing various aspects of Traveloka‚Äôs business. You will get a wide range of exciting opportunities to bring impact by translating business questions into a positivist research paradigm: testable hypotheses, trustworthy metrics, and solid design of experiments. Asking the tough questions, identifying what is critical to drive impact at scale across various domains. Join us in revolutionizing the travel industry through fostering a culture of experimentation!

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with multiple business units to understand their challenges and goals.
Translate business goals into technical requirements and experimentation plan
Develop, implement, and maintain Traveloka‚Äôs Experimentation Platform
Oversee and manage multiple experimentation initiatives, ensuring trustworthiness and on-time delivery.



Requirements

Minimum Qualifications

Degree from top universities in a quantitative field, including the quantitative social sciences (engineering, sciences, statistics, mathematics, economics, etc.)
Minimum of 3 years experience in data science or analytics related role .
Solid critical-thinking and problem-solving skills to create data-driven insights
Conceptual understanding on the design of experiments, and relevant statistical framework (frequentist and/or Bayesian) for analyzing experimental data
Proactive, self-motivated, and able to work independently. 
Strong interpersonal and communication skills, including the ability to describe complex technical concepts to business stakeholders.
Proven experience in managing data projects or data platforms from inception to completion.
Proficient in data extraction and transformation using SQL
Strong expertise in Python/R with experience on statistical libraries (numpy, scipy, statsmodels, stan/PyMC etc.).
Experience with cloud-stack, git, docker and CI/CD workflow

Preferred Qualifications

Expertise in applying one or more of the following to drive business impact:
panel-data econometrics, understanding of random and mixed effects models 
causal inference, dealing with heterogeneous treatment effect and/or noncompliance,
reinforcement learning, multi-armed bandits systems


If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Job Description

Company Overview: 

Join Traveloka, a trailblazing technology company at the forefront of revolutionizing the travel industry. We are on the lookout for a talented and innovative Product Manager to drive excellence in accommodation supply. If you're passionate about shaping the future of travel products and delivering outstanding user experiences, we want to hear from you!

Position Overview: 

We are currently seeking a detail-oriented and data-driven Product Manager to join our team and play a pivotal role in the management of accommodation supply. As a Product Manager specializing in accommodation supply, you will be responsible for developing and executing strategies to enhance and expand our portfolio of accommodations, ensuring exceptional options for our users. This role involves close collaboration with cross-functional teams, conducting market research, and leveraging data insights to drive product innovation and deliver high-quality, appealing accommodation options to our customers.

Responsibilities:

 Product Strategy and Roadmap:
 Develop and execute a comprehensive product strategy for accommodation, aligning with overall company goals and customer needs.
 Create and maintain a roadmap that outlines the evolution of the accommodation product, incorporating flexibility and scalability.
 Product Innovation and Development:
 Collaborate with cross-functional team to conceptualize and bring new features to life, enhancing the overall user experience.
 Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and customer feedback to drive continuous product innovation.
 Stakeholder Management:
 Manage external stakeholders and system providers to ensure connectivity performance meets high-quality standards.
 Collaborate with finance and account management teams to ensure seamless financial processes related to accommodation supply.
 Data-Driven Decision Making:
 Utilize data analytics tools to gain insights into user behavior, market dynamics, and product performance.
 Make informed decisions based on data, continually optimizing the accommodation product for maximum impact.
 Collaboration and Communication:
 Foster strong collaboration with technology, marketing, and customer support teams to ensure alignment and successful product delivery.
 Communicate product vision, updates, and key performance indicators effectively within the organization.



Requirements

Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (Business, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, STEM, Finance) with strong academic results. A master's degree is a plus.
5 years or more of working experience at strategy or management consulting firms, multinational technology or engineering firms, manufacturing or O&G companies, multinational banks, or a credible and strong track record in building or growing a product or businesses.
Proven experience as a Product Manager, with a strong focus on data analytics and content, preferably within the travel or hospitality industry.
Demonstrated expertise in leveraging data analytics tools (e.g. Tableau, GDS, minimum Gsheet or Excel) and platforms to drive insights and inform decision-making.
Strong understanding of market dynamics, user behavior, and industry trends in the accommodation space.
Excellent analytical skills and ability to interpret complex data sets to drive strategy and innovation.
Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple initiatives simultaneously and deliver results within deadlines.
Team player, excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders at all levels.
Detail-oriented, self-motivated, and able to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.



If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!
Skill: Business Insights, Communication, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Data Analytics, Data-driven Decision Making, Key Performance Indicators, Product Strategy, Product Vision, Stakeholder Management, and User Behavior

Job Details:
About VIDA
VIDA is an electronic Certificate Authority (CA) company licensed and certified by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics (Kominfo). We are committed to providing secured and legally binding digital signatures to individuals and organizations. Our solutions leverage national identity verification (Dukcapil) to establish a robust foundation for digital trust in Indonesia.

About the Product
There are three authentication factors that can be used: something you know, something you have, and something you are. VIDA product personifies this in the least disruptive , most intuitive and secure manner. Authentication product building blocks - Consumer Identity Access Management (CIAM), Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), Passwordless Authentication.
Learn more about our authentication product here - https://vida.id/authentication

About the Role
We're searching for a passionate and outcome-driven Product Manager to join our growing VIDA Authentication team. In this role, you'll be responsible for leading the VIDA Authentication product, collaborating closely with a solid team to bring this product to market.

Responsibilities
Strategic Vision & Product Development: Lead the vision and strategy for our Authentication product suite. Ensure seamless integration with Single Sign-On (SSO), Multi-factor Authentication (MFA), and Identity-as-a-Service (IDaaS) features.
Authentication & Authorization Oversight: Drive enhancements in authentication and authorization capabilities, ensuring robust token-based and adaptive authentication features.
Lifecycle Management: Oversee identity lifecycle management, from provisioning to de-provisioning, ensuring smooth workflows for end-users and admins.
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC): Implement and refine RBAC, ensuring precise access governance based on user roles within organizations.
Integrate Directory Services: Collaborate with engineering to ensure compatibility with LDAP, Active Directory, and other directory services.
User Experience: Empower users with self-service options, such as factors management and access request workflows, to enhance their experience.
Collaborate on API Security: Work with security teams to ensure our product's APIs are impenetrable and meet industry standards.
Manage Identity Analytics: Leverage data-driven insights to improve access patterns and reduce security risks.
Audit & Compliance: Ensure that the IAM product provides comprehensive audit trails, access reviews, and adheres to policy enforcement best practices.
Market & Competitor Analysis: Stay abreast of the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in the IAM domain to keep the product competitive.

Additional Responsibilities
Partner with engineering, design, and product marketing teams to define product requirements and user stories.
Prioritize features and functionalities based on user needs, market trends, and business objectives.
Manage the product roadmap and release calendar, ensuring smooth delivery timelines for key milestones.
Collaborate with stakeholders across departments to define success metrics and track product performance.
Develop and maintain comprehensive product documentation, including user stories, product specifications, test cases, and release notes.
Prepare for product handover to operations and marketing teams, ensuring a seamless transition including the GTM strategy.
Drive user research and analyze data to identify opportunities for product improvement.
Proactively identify and mitigate potential risks throughout the product development lifecycle.

Essential Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, Business, or a related field.
5-7 years of experience in B2B product management.
Strong understanding of IAM concepts, including privilege access management (PAM), identity federation, and identity brokerage.
Familiarity with cloud technologies and SSO integrations, strong technical acumen.
Experience working with cross-functional multicultural stakeholders, with a focus on the Southeast Asian market.
Based out of the Jakarta office.
Strong understanding of the digital landscape and user needs of Indonesia and Southeast Asia.
Experience working in a fast-paced, startup environment with a focus on agility and collaboration.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to effectively manage stakeholders.
Proven ability to prioritize tasks, manage time effectively, and communicate potential issues.
Familiarity with product management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum) is a plus.
Passion for innovation and a desire to contribute to a growing company in the digital identity space.

Preferred Qualifications
Experienced with the authentication landscape.
Experience with Auth0/ Okta/Ping Identity/ ForgeRock/ Secure Metric products.
Experience working with Indonesian government regulations and compliance requirements.
Proficiency in user research methods (e.g., user interviews, usability testing).
Strong understanding of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) principles.
Skill: Active Directory

Company Description

About Grab and our workplac

Grab is Southeast Asia‚Äôs leading superapp. We are dedicated to improving the lives of millions of users across the region by providing them everyday services such as deliveries, mobility, financial services, enterprise services and others. More than that, we provide the opportunity for them to have a better life. And that aspiration starts inside Grab because we believe in a seamless blend of work and home life, making every aspect of life better for all.

Guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles‚Äîthe 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility‚Äîwe work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia. With our unwavering commitment to our values, we believe that we're more than a service provider; we're agents of positive change.

The DevOps team, composed of Senior and Junior engineers, is responsible for development, testing, deployment , production support and maintenance of workflow automation and integration solutions predominantly built on iPaaS. The Lead Technical Engineer will play a critical role in driving technical excellence, fostering innovation, and delivering high-quality solutions that meet the needs of the organization and its stakeholders.

Oversee the implementation of changes to the production environment, ensuring that changes are thoroughly tested, reviewed, and approved to minimize the risk of disruptions. 
Handle escalations for critical and complex incidents, expediting resolutions to minimize business impact.
Monitor essential performance indicators (KPIs) daily, analyzing metrics to enhance service quality and customer satisfaction.
Periodically Assess progress and quality of work with the DevOps manager for operational excellence.

Qualifications

Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility to serve our stakeholders and Grabbers.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.
At least 8 years of experience in software engineering, DevOps, or infrastructure roles, emphasizing orchestration, automation, and cloud technologies. Hands-on experience in using popular orchestration tools such as TIBCO business works, Workato, Dell Boomi, Mulesoft etc., would be preferred. 
3 years of experience in leading technical teams in designing, implementing, and managing orchestration solutions in production, while engaging senior business and tech stakeholders.
Proficiency in data query languages like SQL and understanding of data integration standards.
Knowledge of scripting languages like Python, Bash, or PowerShell for automation and scripting tasks would be an advantage. 
Knowledge of Cyber Security Standards (NIST, COBIT, ISO270001) and Identity and Access Management standards and best practices (ABAC, RBAC, OAuth, SAML)
Experience working with Application integration via Secure API methods
Any prior experience in designing and implementing data transformation pipelines and workflows to process, cleanse, enrich, and aggregate large volumes of structured and unstructured data would be an advantage.
Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and analytical thinking.
Effective leadership and communication skills to communicate technical concepts clearly and concisely to both technical and non-technical stakeholders, mentor and coach team members, and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Commitment to continuous learning, staying updated on emerging technologies, and adaptability to rapid changes in technology and environments

Additional Information

Benefits at Grab: 

Benefits

We care deeply about your well-being and are committed to supporting you every step of the way. Here are some of the global benefits we offer:

Protect and provide for your loved ones with peace of mind, knowing we have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.

Your well-being is our priority. Benefit from our holistic well-being initiatives through Wellbeing@Grab, including health programmes, informative webinars, and vibrant carnivals.
Achieve a harmonious work-life balance with our FlexWork arrangements, allowing you to adapt and thrive in your personal and professional life.

We‚Äôve got many different benefits hyper localised in each country. Speak to your recruiter during your interview to find out more.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. If you require accommodations to fully participate in the recruitment process, you are encouraged to include your request(s) when applying.

About The Job

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior 3D Civil Designer (Contract Based) to join our Indonesia team.

When you work for us, you get the chance to join nearly 50,000 people all driven by a common purpose of delivering a more sustainable world. We‚Äôre excited about the challenges ahead. We believe there‚Äôs never been a more rewarding time to work in the energy, chemical and resources sectors.

As Senior 3D Civil Designer, you will be responsible to deliver on all 3D Civil design and drafting activities on the Sorowako and Bahadopi Project.

To succeed in this role, you should have minimum 5 years plus experience in 3D Civil design for earthworks.

Who We Are

Worley is a global professional services company of energy, chemicals and resources experts headquartered in Australia.

Right now, we‚Äôre bridging two worlds as we accelerate to more sustainable energy sources, while helping our customers provide the energy, chemicals, and resources that society needs now.

We partner with our customers to deliver projects and create value over the life of their portfolio of assets. We solve complex problems by finding integrated data-centric solutions from the first stages of consulting and engineering to installation and commissioning, to the last stages of decommissioning and remediation. Join us and help drive innovation and sustainability in our projects.

What You‚Äôll Do

 Responsible for safe working practices both personally and in their designs, using the Worley framework.

 Associate Diploma / Diploma of Engineering in the relevant field or equivalent
 Have the experience and skills to set the standard and drive the rest of the team to excel in
 Competent in Civil 3D CAD software
 Excellent communication skills.
 Work as part of a multi-discipline team.
 Excellent time management skills and the ability to work autonomously.

Moving forward together

We want our people to be energized and empowered to drive sustainable impact. So, our focus is on a values-inspired culture that unlocks brilliance through belonging, connection and innovation.

We‚Äôre building a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace. Creating a space where everyone feels they belong, can be themselves, and are heard.

And we're not just talking about it; we're doing it. We're reskilling our people, leveraging transferable skills, and supporting the transition of our workforce to become experts in today's low carbon energy infrastructure and technology.

Whatever your ambition, there‚Äôs a path for you here. And there‚Äôs no barrier to your potential career success. Join us to broaden your horizons, explore diverse opportunities, and be part of delivering sustainable change.

The Design Lead manages all aspects of the design process, from research and ideation to creative conceptualization and design. He/She collaborates with stakeholders to research and develop cohesive design plans, create concepts, and oversee the development of prototypes.

As a team lead reporting to the Design Manager, he/she initiates design and research activities to be performed to enhance the core competence of his team members. He/She also works with a diverse group of internal and external stakeholders to ensure final design output meet the needs of the organization or customers.

He/She possesses good collaboration skills, partnering with internal and external stakeholders to develop creative design solutions that meet business objectives and goals, manages all aspects of the design process, from research, and ideation to creative conceptualization and design. The ability to delegate and lead design project teams towards successful adoption of new design ideas is essential for the Design Lead. He/She possesses a strong mastery of design fundamentals in their own field of specialization and can generate creative work that meets the requirements of stakeholders.

He/She is able to work on a small number of projects concurrently and deliver on expectations within deadlines with high level of changes and iterations required. Job Description

Determine design solution requirements

Clarify the assigned design project scope, including its goals, requirements, and expectations.
Develop, communicate, and recommend requirement-specific solutions to stakeholders according to the Design System or common design patterns.
Compartmentalize designs into functionally effective components.
Conduct design deliverables technical feasibility analysis on relevant medium/technology that fits with design intent and specification, user needs, and business goals.
Recognize as many constraints as possible ‚Äì including potential threats, unintended risks, and problems before it arises ‚Äì as anticipation to inform the continuous development and iteration of the products and their features to work within the constraints.

Implement design of products and services on prototypes and production level

Oversee design adjustments made on the design implementation.
Author and manage reusable UI components and implement design in adherence to applicable industry and business standards.
Recommend potential solutions to circumvent future design issues throughout the prototyping process.
Lead the design and demonstration of design implementation on production level.
Lead the design implementation for prototyping, from lower fidelity to higher fidelity (with closeness to real product) and production level.
Communicate technical feasibility analysis on design implementation.

Evaluate product and service performance and maintain a high standard of design quality

Proactively provide explanations regarding the limits of technical solutions and propose alternative / potential solutions to overcome the design intent barriers.
Implement changes and fix errors across the lifecycle of products or services.
Identify outdated products or services and revitalize with design solutions in partnership with stakeholders.
Evaluate product concepts or technical solutions to identify the most viable products or services for implementation.
Test design solutions with validation activity that meets design intent and specifications and get them ready to be implemented in the intended platform.
Proactively suggest methods for a testing mechanism to ensure smooth research and design process implementation.
Collaborate with designers and stakeholders in producing designs and test specifications for new visual or product and feature ideas, including participation in design research.
Engage relevant stakeholders to study the technical feasibility of products or services before going into the development phase.
Preside over a decision to provide an alternative solution, approach, and perspective outside of standard practices that enhance the team problem solving and validation to ensure the highest design quality output possible.
Monitor design project execution to ensure timely completion and raise concern early to anticipate delay when required.
Communicate the rationale behind the design decision according to the Design System and apply the solution based on agreed direction.
Updating style guide documentation to keep the Design System relevant and ensuring the standards are maintained.
Work to improve collaboration and communication between the design team and the engineering teams.

Construct, conduct, or support design research studies

Ascertain research objectives are relevant to the project's goals and design scope, including formulating the research questions.
Identify the methodology and methods, create research tools, and define sampling strategy and research participants based on the research objective framing and research question.
Understand the research context based on stakeholders' goals, requirements, and expectations, and clarify when required.
Determine logistics for and scheduling needs of design research studies.
Draft essential documents that will protect the mutual interests of research participants and the company.
Collect data on consumers, competitors, and market conditions using the most appropriate quantitative or qualitative research methods and tools.
Conduct secondary research using appropriate methods and tools if required.
Complete the research process and monitor its relevancy and effectiveness with close cooperation with stakeholders.

Analysis and abductive data synthesis towards dissemination

Draw conclusions from design research findings, craft actionable insights, and identify design opportunity areas.
Uncover trends and patterns based on analysis gathered to enrich insights and inspire opportunity areas.
Liaise with relevant stakeholders to disseminate design research insights.
Facilitate and gain mutual action items to apply the research insights and opportunity areas into actionable design ideas.

Facilitate and drive user-centricity application during product innovation cycle with stakeholders

Initiate, organize, and execute multidisciplinary and cross-functional workshops, sprints, or meetings that consider the holistic aspects of user desirability, business viability, and technological feasibility for products and features across the business domains.
Assist product teams in framing business problems using a design perspective in considering users' latent needs.
Provide technical guidance to various stakeholders for the implementation of human-centric design solutions if required.

Minimum qualifications

Between 5‚Äì7 years overall work experience as a hands-on UI Developer or Front End Engineer in the industry (education background could range from Computer Science or any other relevant Programming disciplines; or Human-Computer Interaction, Digital Design, or other related field, with equivalent practical design experience).
Portfolio that showcases UIDev craft (and its applications of technical methodology) with some level of understanding of the Human Centered Design methodology (along with its methods and tools), willingness to learn and iterate, and passionate about design and storytelling.
Experience working with web and/or mobile based technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Android Studio, XCode, React, React Native, etc.).
Experience working with web or mobile based technologies using design and prototyping tools (such as Figma, Adobe Creative Cloud, Balsamiq, Zeplin, ProtoPie, Miro, etc.)
Fluency in Indonesian and English communications (both verbal and written).
A deep sense of accountability, adaptability, and embracing ambiguity working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience working with Design System. With understanding about accessibility and design patterns.

Job Details:
Aspire is the leading all-in-one finance operating system for growing businesses in APAC. We are on a mission to reinvent business finance for a new generation of entrepreneurs and business owners, empowering startups and MSME to realise their full potential.

Founded in 2018, Aspire has raised over USD 300M+ across equity and debt from world-class investors. In 2023, we successfully closed an oversubscribed USD 100 million Series C equity round led by Sequoia Capital and Lightspeed Ventures with participation of Tencent, Paypal Ventures, LGT Capital Partners, Picus Capital and MassMutual Ventures. To power our solutions, we have partnered with some of the best companies in the world such as Visa and Wise and helped more than 15,000 businesses using our suite of products.

For 2 consecutive years in 2022 & 2023, Aspire has been awarded Best Employer of the Year and Startup of the year by Asia FinTech Awards, and also LinkedIn‚Äôs Top Startup in Singapore. In 2023, we also made it to CB Insights‚Äô Top 100 Global Fintech List.

You will be amazed by the energy and experience of our team! Aspire serves as an environment for you to innovate and drive change with our team of ex-entrepreneurs, ex-founders, and high-achievers with international and diverse backgrounds.

Are you a top talent who is passionate about entrepreneurship? Join our rapidly growing team to make an impact in the fintech space!

About Duitku

Duitku.com (an Aspire company) is an online payment solutions provider. We offer online payment coverage for users in Indonesia with credit and debit cards, mobile payments, e-wallets, bank transfer, prepaid cards, vouchers and many others. Notable business partners of Duitku include Kimia Farma, Indodax, Akulaku, Metrodata, and Oxygen.

About The Team

At Duitku, we are committed to revolutionizing the payment gateway landscape in Indonesia. Our Engineering Team is at the forefront of this transformative journey, responsible for designing, building, and maintaining Duitku's exceptional products and infrastructure. We take pride in developing cutting-edge, digital-first technology solutions that simplify payment processes for businesses and individuals alike.

About The Role

As an Engineering (Associate) Manager at Duitku, you will play a crucial role in delivering our mission to create a seamless payment experience. You will manage teams to deliver exceptional products while fostering a positive team culture, focusing on diversity and team excellence. Your responsibilities will include building careers and supporting the professional growth of engineers, improving hiring and onboarding processes, and setting and communicating direction for your teams.

The responsibilities cover:

Lead and mentor engineering teams to deliver high-quality products, ensuring team alignment with company goals. 
Proactively improve hiring, onboarding, and team processes to enhance efficiency and team performance. 
Work closely with a diverse set of stakeholders to understand requirements, set priorities, and communicate progress. 
Provide technical guidance and support to teams, ensuring best practices in software development and engineering methodologies. 

Minimum Qualifications:

Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with experience working with diverse stakeholders. 
8-10+ years of experience & decent experience in leading software engineering teams, with exposure to organizational, personal, and technical challenges. 
Experience with CI/CD pipelines, unit testing, and other related best practices. 
Proven experience in hiring, recruiting, and onboarding engineering talent. 
Practical experience as a Scrum Master or Software Engineer working with scrum methodology. 
Experience in scaling up engineering teams and improving team processes. 
Familiarity with software development, specifically with the.NET framework. 
Basic understanding of code security practices and principles
Ability to conduct code reviews and provide technical design guidance. 

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in the fintech or payment gateway industry. 
Familiarity with Indonesian payment systems and regulatory requirements. 
Knowledge of modern programming languages and frameworks. 
Demonstrated ability to foster an inclusive and diverse team environment. 

What We Offer

Uncapped flexible annual leave. 
Hybrid work arrangement. 
Training subsidy for your professional growth. 
Wellness benefit. 
Team bonding budget to foster collaboration and sense of belonging. 
Flexibility to work from anywhere (for up to 90 days per annum). 
Culture is Key: We always strive to cultivate a special culture that brings special talents together - You can learn more about our culture on our careers site and LinkedIn Life page.

You may withdraw consent for such collection, use and disclosure, and make an access or correction request in respect of your personal data, in accordance with the Policy by emailing people@aspireapp.com.

Introduction

As a Package Consultant at IBM, get ready to tackle numerous mission-critical company directives. Our team takes on the challenge of designing, developing and re-engineering highly complex application components and integrating software packages using various tools. You will use a mix of consultative skills, business knowledge, and technical expertise to effectively integrate packaged technology into our clients' business environment and achieve business results.

Your Role and Responsibilities

As a Consultant you will serve as a client-facing practitioner who will sells, leads and implements expert services utilizing the breadth of IBM's offerings and technologies. A successful consultant is regarded by clients as a trusted business advisor who collaborates to provide innovative solutions used to solve the most challenging business problems.

Your Primary Responsibilities Include


Lead the technical design and implementation of SAP solutions for simplicity, amplification, and maintainability.
Work from strategy development to solution implementation using your knowledge of SAP and working with the latest technologies.
Partner with a cross-functional global team to ensure customer success in an agile environment.


Required Technical and Professional Expertise


At least 5 years of experience in the area of SAP HANA MM and associated modules.
Has experience managing end-to-end full cycle implementations (from blue printing, realization, go live to production support) of S/4HANA Greenfield / Migration projects in complex landscape will be preferable.


Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise

As above.

About Business Unit

IBM Consulting is IBM‚Äôs consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients‚Äô businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.

Your Life @ IBM

In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.

Being an IBMer means you‚Äôll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you‚Äôll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.

Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.

Are you ready to be an IBMer?

About IBM

IBM‚Äôs greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.

Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we‚Äôre also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business.

At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it‚Äôs time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

Job Details:
Responsibilities:
SAP PP and QM Implementation: Participate in the implementation of SAP PP and QM modules, including requirement gathering, solution design, configuration, testing, and go-live support. Ensure all configurations align with industry best practices and organizational standards.
Business Process Analysis: Collaborate with clients to analyze their production and quality management processes. Identify areas for improvement and recommend SAP PP and QM solutions to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
System Integration: Ensure seamless integration of SAP PP and QM with other SAP modules (e.g., MM, SD, PM) and external systems. Address any integration challenges that arise during the implementation process.
Support and Maintenance: Provide ongoing support and maintenance for SAP PP and QM modules, including troubleshooting issues, performing root cause analysis, and implementing corrective actions.
User Training: Develop and deliver training sessions for end-users and key stakeholders to ensure they are proficient in using SAP PP and QM functionalities. Create user documentation and training materials as needed.
Project Management: Manage and coordinate SAP PP and QM projects, including planning, execution, and post-implementation support. Ensure projects are completed on time, within scope, and within budget.
Custom Development: Collaborate with ABAP developers to design and implement custom enhancements and reports based on client specifications.
Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of SAP PP and QM configurations, processes, and customizations. Ensure documentation is up-to-date and accessible to relevant stakeholders.
Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on the latest SAP PP and QM trends, technologies, and best practices. Proactively suggest improvements to existing systems and processes to enhance performance and efficiency.

Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field.
Experience: Minimum of 2 full cycles as an SAP PPQM Consultant with a proven track record of successful implementations and support. 5-7 years of experience in the same area.
Technical Skills: In-depth knowledge of SAP PP and QM module functionalities, including production planning, shop floor control, quality inspection, and quality control. Proficiency in SAP PP and QM configuration and customization.
Integration Knowledge: Strong understanding of integration points between SAP PP, QM, and other SAP modules (e.g., MM, SD, PM).
Analytical Skills: Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to translate business requirements into effective SAP solutions.
Communication Skills: Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with clients, team members, and stakeholders.
Project Management: Experience managing SAP PP and QM projects, including planning, execution, and post-implementation support.
Skill: Enterprise Solution Design, SAP ERP, SAP PP, SAP Quality Management (QM), and SAP Solutions

At ACD, we live and breathe creativity. We're a cutting-edge agency where innovation meets passion, and our talented team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of design. We're committed to delivering exceptional solutions that not only meet but exceed our clients' expectations.

Job Details:
Company Description

Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, and cybersecurity.

By combining creativity, tech, and data insights, we empower our customers to transform their business and unlock the future.

With 25 years‚Äô of experience and 8,000 employees across Europe and the Middle East, Devoteam promotes responsible tech for people and works to create better change.

#Creative Tech for Better Change

Devoteam has launched in January 2021 its new strategic plan, Infinite 2024, with the ambition to become the #1 EMEA partner of the leading Cloud-based platform companies (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft, Salesforce, ServiceNow), further reinforced by deep expertise in digital strategy, cybersecurity, and data.
 
 
Job Description

In this context, you‚Äôll be joining as Senior Google Workspace Engineer and reporting to the Indonesia Tribe Lead for Infrastructure. This role will be responsible for leading and advising on the design, implementation, and optimization of Google Workspace solutions for our clients. The ideal candidate possesses a deep understanding of Google Workspace, excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping clients achieve their productivity and collaboration goals..

The Senior Google Workspace Engineer will be responsible for the following activities: 

Develop a deep understanding of clients' business needs, goals, and technical environments.

Conduct thorough assessments of existing Google Workspace setups and identify areas for improvement.

Design and propose tailored Google Workspace solutions that align with clients' strategic objectives.

Clearly communicate technical recommendations and implementation plans to clients in a consultative manner.

Lead the implementation and configuration of Google Workspace services, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.

Troubleshoot complex technical issues and provide expert guidance on Google Workspace best practices.

Stay abreast of the latest Google Workspace updates and features to leverage new functionalities for clients.

Develop and deliver training programs to empower clients in utilizing Google Workspace effectively.

Manage Google Workspace projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.

Coordinate with internal teams and external stakeholders to ensure smooth project execution.

Provide ongoing support and maintenance to clients after project completion.
 
 
Qualifications

 
A bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, cybersecurity,

5+ years of experience in Google Workspace administration and consulting.

Proven track record of successfully designing and implementing Google Workspace solutions for diverse clients.

Experience in a client-facing role, with strong consulting and communication skills.

Google Workspace certifications (e.g., Professional Collaboration Engineer) are strongly preferred.

Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.

Outstanding communication and presentation skills, with the ability to tailor technical information to different audiences.

Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Ability to build strong relationships with clients and internal stakeholders.
 
 
Additional Information

Status: Full-Time

Duration: -

Beginning date: August 2024

The Devoteam Group is committed to equal opportunities, promoting its employees on the basis of merit and actively fighting against all forms of discrimination. We believe that diversity contributes to the creativity, dynamism and excellence of our organization. All our positions are open to people with disabilities.

Job Details:
Requirements

Candidate must possess at least Bachelor‚Äôs Degree.
Proficient in English (business level) is must.
Having more than 10 years of working experience as presales and project manager in SAP field.
Excellent manager-level Interpersonal skills.
Having good problem solving, analytical and logical thinking.
Proactive and self-motivated, able to work under pressure in tight schedule.

Responsibilities

Product Knowledge: is expected to have a deep understanding of SAP's products and solutions. This includes various modules such as SAP ERP, SAP S/4HANA (RISE, GROW), SAP SCM, SAP BI, and more, depending on the company's product portfolio.
Solution Presentations: SAP Presales Consultants conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase how SAP solutions can meet the specific requirements of the potential clients. They tailor these presentations to highlight the key features and advantages most relevant to the client's industry and business challenges.
Requirements Gathering: Presales consultants work closely with the sales team and potential clients to gather and analyze business requirements. This information helps in customizing the SAP solution proposal to match the client's unique needs.
Technical Expertise: A solid technical understanding of SAP's products is essential to address client queries and concerns effectively. Presales consultants must be able to articulate the technical aspects of SAP solutions in a way that non-technical stakeholders can comprehend.
Proposal Preparation: SAP Presales Consultants contribute to proposal writing and tender responses. They create comprehensive documents detailing the proposed solution, implementation plan, pricing, and other relevant information required for the client's decision-making process.
Proof of Concepts (PoCs): In some cases, clients may request a proof of concept to test the feasibility of SAP solutions in their environment. Presales consultants may be involved in designing and conducting PoCs to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed solution.
Collaboration: The role requires close collaboration with the sales team, product managers, project managers, and other stakeholders. Presales consultants provide valuable insights to the sales team regarding client needs and market trends, which aids in devising winning strategies.
Continuous Learning: SAP is continually evolving, with updates and new releases being introduced regularly. This role need to stay up to date with the latest advancements in SAP products and solutions to effectively address client inquiries and present the most relevant solutions.
Project Management capabilities: This role also requires project delivery capabilities and experience, either in Finance or Supply Chain Management areas. Experience as a project manager of SAP implementation is critical for this role.
Certification in any SAP expertise area is a plus.

With 5,900 consultants in Japan, and 2,400 in overseas offices concentrated in Asia, our 8,300 consultants and global alliance partners provide truly comprehensive services.

Job Titles: Tencent Cloud IaaS Product Solution Architect - Thailand
Job Details:
Responsibilities:

About The Company

Tencent is a leading global technology company focused on connecting people and developing innovative products and services that improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 and publicly traded on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange since 2004, Tencent offers a variety of products and services, including leading communication and social platforms (Weixin/WeChat), high-quality entertainment (from video games, music, TV and film, sport and literature), FinTech (WeChat Pay and QQ Wallet) and industry-leading cloud products and services.

Cloud & Smart Industries Group (CSIG) is responsible for promoting the company's cloud and industry Internet strategy. CSIG explores the interactions between users and industries to create innovative solutions for smart industries via technological advancements such as cloud, AI, and network security. While driving the digitalization of retail, medical, education, transportation and other industries, CSIG helps companies serve users in smarter ways, building a new ecosystem of intelligent industries that connect users and businesses.

Position Overview:

Are you passionate about shaping the future of cloud infrastructure? Join Tencent Cloud as an IaaS Product Architect and play a pivotal role in providing technical expertise and support for our industry-leading IaaS/PaaS products. In this role, you'll collaborate closely with our sales and technical teams to work with our industry clients, offering professional technical guidance, understanding their needs, and designing robust technical solutions. With a broad technical vision, you'll integrate various products and partners to build ecosystem capabilities, deliver tailored solutions, and drive rapid product development. You'll also lead project implementation, handle customer requirements, provide feedback for product enhancement, and contribute to continuous solution refinement and dissemination.

Responsibilities:

Prepare, execute, oversee technical proof-of-concept and its activities
Create winning proposals with comprehensive statements of work
Work closely with Clients and Sales Team to understand their business needs
Work with field teams to develop feasible working solutions and scope
Conduct technical presentations, webinars, and workshops. 

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or its equivalents. Relevant cloud certifications at professional level will be highly advantageous. 
Minimum 5 years of cloud pre-sales architecture experience with a strong focus on IaaS and PaaS products
Scripting skill such as Python, Bash or Powershell is a plus
Broad technical knowledge across multiple technological domains, including Linux & Windows Server OS, web service stack, networking, Migration, data storage, containerization, DevOps. 
Excellent communications and writing skills in both English and Thai. 

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Tencent

Diversity, equity and inclusion are important, interdependent components of our workplace. As an equal opportunity employer, we firmly believe that diverse voices fuel our innovation and allow us to better serve our users and the community. We foster an environment where every employee of Tencent feels supported and inspired to achieve individual and common goals.
Skill: Architecture, Azure Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Cloud Computing, Computer Science, Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Presales, Statements of Work (SOW), Technical Presentations, Thai, and Web Conferencing

About The Company

Tencent is a leading global technology company focused on connecting people and developing innovative products and services that improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 and publicly traded on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange since 2004, Tencent offers a variety of products and services, including leading communication and social platforms (Weixin/WeChat), high-quality entertainment (from video games, music, TV and film, sport and literature), FinTech (WeChat Pay and QQ Wallet) and industry-leading cloud products and services.

Cloud & Smart Industries Group (CSIG) is responsible for promoting the company's cloud and industry Internet strategy. CSIG explores the interactions between users and industries to create innovative solutions for smart industries via technological advancements such as cloud, AI, and network security. While driving the digitalization of retail, medical, education, transportation and other industries, CSIG helps companies serve users in smarter ways, building a new ecosystem of intelligent industries that connect users and businesses.

Position Overview:

Are you passionate about shaping the future of cloud infrastructure? Join Tencent Cloud as an IaaS Product Architect and play a pivotal role in providing technical expertise and support for our industry-leading IaaS/PaaS products. In this role, you'll collaborate closely with our sales and technical teams to work with our industry clients, offering professional technical guidance, understanding their needs, and designing robust technical solutions. With a broad technical vision, you'll integrate various products and partners to build ecosystem capabilities, deliver tailored solutions, and drive rapid product development. You'll also lead project implementation, handle customer requirements, provide feedback for product enhancement, and contribute to continuous solution refinement and dissemination.

Responsibilities:

Prepare, execute, oversee technical proof-of-concept and its activities
Create winning proposals with comprehensive statements of work
Work closely with Clients and Sales Team to understand their business needs
Work with field teams to develop feasible working solutions and scope
Conduct technical presentations, webinars, and workshops. 

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or its equivalents. Relevant cloud certifications at professional level will be highly advantageous. 
Minimum 5 years of cloud pre-sales architecture experience with a strong focus on IaaS and PaaS products
Scripting skill such as Python, Bash or Powershell is a plus
Broad technical knowledge across multiple technological domains, including Linux & Windows Server OS, web service stack, networking, Migration, data storage, containerization, DevOps. 
Excellent communications and writing skills in both English and Bahasa Indonesia. 

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Tencent

Diversity, equity and inclusion are important, interdependent components of our workplace. As an equal opportunity employer, we firmly believe that diverse voices fuel our innovation and allow us to better serve our users and the community. We foster an environment where every employee of Tencent feels supported and inspired to achieve individual and common goals.
Skill: Architecture, Azure Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Bahasa Indonesia, Cloud Computing, Computer Science, Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Presales, Statements of Work (SOW), Technical Presentations, and Web Conferencing

Job Details:
Responsibilities

 About Us
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

TikTok E-Commerce Creator Growth and Development Team's objective is to acquire and cultivate creators in a scaleable way to create E-Commerce content in TikTok. This role will help to contribute creator academy content.

- Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders on different brand projects across creator managers, account managers, campaign teams, etc.
- Collaborate with external UG agencies to improve the advertising investment of top creators, optimize ROAS, thus promote the GMV performance of products and increase P&L .
- Utilizing data proficiently to deeply understand pain points, formulate business requirements, identify opportunities and prioritise solutions. Driving solutions with various crossfunctional teams. 

Qualifications

 Minimum Qualifications:
- 3-5 years of experience in ecommerce platform, consulting firm or internet strategy, industry or market research and business analytics with eCommerce relevant experience.
 
Preferred Qualifications: 
- Bachelor's degree or above.
- Good understanding of product assortment.
- Good negotiation skills, strong logical thinking, excellent data analysis and interpersonal skills.
- Well connected to big players within the industry.
- Collaborative and open to changes and challenges.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Company Description

Kata.ai is an Indonesian Conversational Artificial Intelligence company with a focus on creating technology to enhance the understanding of human conversations, improving the way humans collaborate with machines. Kata.ai‚Äôs Natural Language Processing (NLP) technology powers MultiPurpose chatbots (virtual customer service / virtual friend) for major corporations in Indonesia across different kinds of industries such as Unilever (FMCG), Telkomsel (Telco), Bank BRI (Financial Services), and Alfamart (Retail).

The company‚Äôs proprietary Kata Bot Platform can be leveraged to create feature-rich chatbots on top of Kata.ai‚Äôs robust and scalable AI technology platform, ensuring company of any size can easily build their own chatbot on any messaging platform. With this platform, it is now possible for the business to focus on designing engaging interaction for their customers, while Kata.ai handles all the technology aspects of the chatbots.

Established in 2015, the company has become a trusted partner for major corporations such as Microsoft, Accenture, and Line. In 2020, the company received Series-B funding from TransPacific Technology Fund and MDI Venture.

Strong communication and presentation skills.

Strong skills in illustration.

Job Details:
As our Product Manager, you'll get to help solve consumer problems, define product roadmaps, craft product vision, and build products to scale to help grow the GoFood business. As a Product Manager in GoFood Affordable team, you will work alongside other Product Managers, Engineering, Designers, BI Analysts, Data Science, Customer Research and Business teams to help Gojek deliver innovative and delightful customer experiences.

What You Will Do

Own and drive product and feature roadmap to fruition through alignment with all stakeholders, and become an internal champion of your product line
Engage cross-functionally and develop strong relationships across stakeholders to understand their goals and priorities. Work with these stakeholders to help them convert these goals into reality.
Deliver. You do more than talk - you put things on paper, get your hands dirty, and execute with precision to make sure products and features are launched 
Be a customer advocate, articulate their needs and deliver user-friendly solutions that solve their challenges
Seek product ideas and feedback, gather requirements, write specs, create wireframes and workflows, and demo them early and often
Understand that ‚Äúone size doesn‚Äôt fit all‚Äù and conceptualize solutions that are configurable and adaptable to the maximum extent possible
Giving clarity to the product development group and stakeholders on the requirement and the impact of each feature as well as the go to market strategy to ensure adoption of the features. 
Using data to analyze each feature's adoption and impact, while making improvements on the features to solve customer's pain points

What You Will Need

Minimum 3 years experience specifically in product management, ideally working on consumer-facing, large-scale products
A self-supporting, proactive, and eager-to-learn attitude; able to take ownership of assigned tasks
Experience working on Objectives and Key results model of goal setting
Data-oriented with excellent analytical skills; Able to dig into data to discover nuances, and define & measure success on every project. Prior experience with experimentation is a strong plus
Strong strategic planning and organizational skills
Excellent written & verbal communication skills focused on improving collaboration, understanding & information exchange across all stakeholders
Be able to work with agile product development teams and identify new ways to help your team be productive. Experience of working with distributed teams is desired
Comfortable working in a complex and fast-paced environment

Join Gojek's Product Management team, a hub of innovation and collaboration, to revolutionize everyday experiences at scale, while embracing a culture that values creativity and meaningful impact. We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently. If you have the curiosity, passion for technology, and collaborative spirit, work with us and let's solve problems with technology.

GoFood‚Äôs user base consists of affordability-sensitive users and if we can organically make eating (ordering) more affordable, then these users could become more loyal and this segment could grow. The GoFood affordable team works on building offerings for the affordability suite of GoFood products and is dedicated to enhancing the experience for both customers and merchant partners while continuously exploring new growth opportunities. The latest offering that we have launched for users across Indonesia is GoFood PAS.

About GoTo Group

GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to ‚ÄúEmpower Progress‚Äô by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia‚Äôs vast consumer household.

About Gojek

Gojek is Southeast Asia‚Äôs leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.

About GoTo Financial

Job Titles: Web Platform Engineer - Junior or Senior Consultant
Job Details:
About EY:

EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in Consulting and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.

We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets.‚ÄØThat starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.

EY advises clients to understand, architect, select and implement bleeding-edge solutions required to efficiently run their businesses, with a focus on Digital and Cloud. These service areas span E-commerce, Solution Architecture, Mobile Applications, Digital Platform Architecture, Digital Technology Strategy, and Digital IT Operations.

The exceptional EY experience. It‚Äôs yours to build.

The opportunity:

The Digital & Emerging Technology team works collaboratively with clients to transform their business through disruptive innovation enablement and transformational design solutions. The team supports our clients in modernizing systems, processes and products to enhance business and customer-facing platforms and services to support high performance in a rapidly changing and competitive environment. Our team helps clients sustain competitive advantage and profitability by developing technology strategies, products, and solutions to stay ahead of the rapid pace of change and disruption and supporting the execution of complex transformations.

We are seeking talented and passionate Web Engineers who have worked with modern software solutions including ReactJS, Svelte, or other Web Library/Framework to join our team, you will have opportunities to work on multiple backend services, talking directly to the end-users, identifying their challenges and how we can help them in their work life. It is very important that our team members take initiatives to identify problems, and have the right mindset and skill sets to solve them. While our teams primary focus is within the financial services industries, you will have opportunities to support other sectors including healthcare, automotive, high-tech, and media.

Your key responsibilities: 

The goal is to support our clients to transform their business through technology. As a Web Engineer you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, developing, integrating, testing, and operating your team's software systems in a consistently high quality manner. When working on the systems within your team's domain, you take into account the appropriate architectural patterns, code design, and infrastructure options, ensuring that you deliver a system that is secure, reliable, maintainable, extensible and very well tested. Beyond delivery to the production system, engineers will be responsible for post deployment monitoring as well.

In addition to being trusted to operate independently, you also maintain a good partnership with your technical and non-technical stakeholders for projects that you are involved in. You take an active role in your projects as a team member involved in product design to rollout, taking ownership of your work and constantly focusing on moving these projects forward.

Being an experienced team member, you are also expected to continuously help the team grow and improve either by mentoring new or junior members of your team or by introducing and adopting process improvements.

Requirements: 

Bachelor's degree (Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Mathematics) or related experience
1-3 years of Development experience
Strong knowledge of algorithms and data structures
Fluency in developing and understanding sequence diagrams, class models, etc.
Proficiency in NodeJS, React or other Web Library/Framework
Experience with the mobile web platform is necessary
Provide mobile web functionality for innovation
Working knowledge of the general web architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
Experience in writing maintainable and testable code, including API design, unit testing and UI testing techniques.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (preferably Git)
Collaborate with backend team and product/experience teams
Humble and hungry engineer. Always curious, always looking for a better way
Highly accountable and takes ownership of one's own work.

For senior software engineer:

4+ years of professional web software development experience
Experience owning an end-to-end feature
Possess excellent communication, sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills, able to think critically of the current system in terms of growth and stability
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
Familiarity Microservices, Service Worker and PWA (Progressive Web App)
Familiarity with modern build pipelines and tools
Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues
Experience with browser APIs and optimizing front end performance

Ideally, you must have a:

Prior consulting experience relevant to industry-specific business and technology functions
Prior consulting experience highly preferred

What we look for 

We‚Äôre interested in passionate individuals with a strong vision and a desire to stay on top of trends. If you‚ÄØhave‚ÄØa genuine passion for helping businesses achieve their full potential, then these role(s) are for you. 

What We Offer

Continuous learning: You‚Äôll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next
Success as defined by you: We‚Äôll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, on your way
Transformative leadership: We‚Äôll give you the insights, coaching, and confidence to be the leader the world needs
Diverse and inclusive culture: You‚Äôll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs

If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.

EY is an equal opportunity, affirmative action employer providing equal employment opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, or any other legally protected basis, including arrest and conviction records, by applicable law.

EY is committed to providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with special needs. If you are a qualified individual with special needs and need assistance applying online or need to request an accommodation during the interview process, please speak to our HR executives, and we will be happy to help you.

Job Details:
Note--Job is based in Saudi Arabia in full-time onsite mode. ( No remote/hybrid)

Position Objective:
We are seeking experienced SAP Functional Consultants to join our team, with a primary focus on leading and managing the implementation and optimization of SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC). The successful candidates will play a crucial role in analyzing business processes and mapping them to SAC solutions, acting as a bridge between the business and technical teams to ensure the effective integration and utilization of SAC applications.

Job Description and Responsibilities:
Business Process Analysis:
Analyze and document business requirements and map them to SAC solutions, ensuring a deep understanding of business needs.
Facilitate workshops with stakeholders to gather detailed requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
System Configuration & Customization:
Configure and customize SAC applications, including data models, stories, dashboards, and planning workflows.
Develop complex calculations, scripts, and data transformations using SAC's modelling capabilities.
Integrate SAC with other SAP and non-SAP systems:
Ensure seamless data flow and reporting across platforms.
Advanced Analytics & Predictive Capabilities:
Leverage SAC's predictive analytics features to create forecasting models and what-if scenarios.
Implement machine learning algorithms within SAC to enhance decision-making processes.
Project Management & Collaboration:
Manage SAC projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely delivery within budget constraints.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure a holistic approach to analytics.
Data Connectivity & Integration:
Set up and manage data connections within SAC, including live data connections and data acquisition models.
Ensure data integrity and consistency across various data sources connected to SAC.
Training & Support:
Conduct workshops and training sessions to educate end-users on SAC functionalities.
Provide ongoing support and troubleshooting for SAC applications.
Optimization & Continuous Improvement:
Continuously monitor SAC performance and identify opportunities for optimization.
Stay updated with the latest SAC features and best practices.
Compliance & Reporting:
Ensure all SAC implementations comply with relevant standards.
Design and generate complex reports and dashboards for senior management.

Qualifications and Skills:
Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Finance, Accounting, Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, Data Science, or a related field.
SAP Certification in SAP Analytics Cloud, certified by SAP partners.
Additional certifications in data analytics, machine learning, or data science are advantageous.
Min 10+ years of experience as an SAP Functional Consultant with hands-on experience in SAP Analytics Cloud implementation and Group Reporting.
Proven track record of leading and delivering successful SAP Analytics Cloud projects across various industries.
Advanced knowledge of SAP Analytics Cloud configuration.
Proficiency in SAC scripting languages.
Experience with integrating SAC with SAP BW/4HANA, SAP S/4HANA, and other third-party data sources.
Strong understanding of SAC's predictive analytics capabilities.
Familiarity with SAP Data Warehouse Cloud and SAP Business Technology Platform is a plus.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong project management skills.
High attention to detail and a commitment to continuous improvement.
Proficient in English; additional languages are an advantage.
Skill: Business Process Analysis, Data Modeling, SAP Analytics Cloud, SAP Business Warehouse (SAP BW), Scripting, and Technical Specs

Job Details:
About The Job

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior 3D Roads Designer (Contract Based) to join our Indonesia team.

When you work for us, you get the chance to join nearly 50,000 people all driven by a common purpose of delivering a more sustainable world. We‚Äôre excited about the challenges ahead. We believe there‚Äôs never been a more rewarding time to work in the energy, chemical and resources sectors.

As a Senior 3D Roads Designer, you will be responsible to prepare engineering drawings and documentation.

To succeed in this role, you should have at least 5 years‚Äô experience in roads design and drafting.

Who We Are

Worley is a global professional services company of energy, chemicals and resources experts headquartered in Australia.

Right now, we‚Äôre bridging two worlds as we accelerate to more sustainable energy sources, while helping our customers provide the energy, chemicals, and resources that society needs now.

We partner with our customers to deliver projects and create value over the life of their portfolio of assets. We solve complex problems by finding integrated data-centric solutions from the first stages of consulting and engineering to installation and commissioning, to the last stages of decommissioning and remediation. Join us and help drive innovation and sustainability in our projects.

What You‚Äôll Do

We are looking for a Senior 3D Roads Designer to join our team in Sulawesi, Indonesia.

The Role Responsibilities Include

 Responsible for safe working practices both personally and in their designs, using the Worley framework.
 Ensure they understand and apply the Worley quality management system.
 Ensure design work conforms to applicable specifications, codes, and standards.
 Ensure checking procedures are adhered to before issue of drawings and documents, to ensure no rework due to errors in design.
 Prepare engineering drawings and documentation.

 Ensure project scope, budgets and schedules for design and drafting work are effectively communicated and met on projects.
 Control the allocation of drafting work to junior designers in the project.
 Mentoring and supervision of junior designers.

What You‚Äôll Have

 Designs for constructability, commissioning, operations, and maintenance.
 5 years plus experience in roads design and drafting.
 Associate Diploma / Diploma of Engineering in the relevant field or equivalent
 Have the experience and skills to set the standard and drive the rest of the team to excel in HSE
 Competent in relevant CAD software
 Excellent communication skills.
 Work as part of a multi-discipline team
 Excellent time management skills and the ability to work autonomously.

Moving forward together

We want our people to be energized and empowered to drive sustainable impact. So, our focus is on a values-inspired culture that unlocks brilliance through belonging, connection, and innovation.

We‚Äôre building a diverse, inclusive, and respectful workplace. Creating a space where everyone feels they belong, can be themselves, and are heard.

And we're not just talking about it; we're doing it. We're reskilling our people, leveraging transferable skills, and supporting the transition of our workforce to become experts in today's low carbon energy infrastructure and technology.

Whatever your ambition, there‚Äôs a path for you here. And there‚Äôs no barrier to your potential career success. Join us to broaden your horizons, explore diverse opportunities, and be part of delivering sustainable change.

Ready to join us? Apply now to submit your CV

Assist in creating training videos and e-learning modules.
Continuous Improvement and Best Practices:
Provide feedback and recommendations for process improvements and optimization of the HRIS implementation.

Opportunity to drive and execute new ideas with a measurable impact

Are you ready to unleash your potential?

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society‚Äôs biggest challenges and creating a better future. We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

Work you‚Äôll do

You will be part of Deloitte Southeast Asia Technology & Transformation‚Äôs Talent Acquisition Central Services team to provide impactful supports in delivering recruitment strategy and execution to our fast-growing management consulting practice. You will give the best-in-class experience to our hiring managers, internal stakeholders, external agencies and most importantly our prospective candidates.

You will:

 Collect, clean, and organize recruitment data from various sources, ensuring data accuracy and completeness
 Utilize expertise in Advanced Excel, PowerBI, PowerQuery, Python, and R to perform in-depth analysis of recruitment data, identifying trends, patterns, and insights

 Bachelor/Master's degree in a relevant field such as HR Analytics, Data Science, Statistics, or a related discipline

 Proficient in Advanced Excel, PowerBI, PowerQuery, Python, and/or R for data manipulation and analysis
 Strong analytical skills with the ability to turn data into actionable insights
 Excellent communication skills to convey complex data findings to non-technical stakeholders effectively
 Detail-oriented with a commitment to data accuracy and integrity
 Ability to work collaboratively in a team and adapt to a fast-paced recruitment environment
 Experience with HR or recruitment data and tools is a plus
